name: Sheepherd Dog
description:
Hello, World!

This is my submission to the GMTK 2019 jam, with a theme of "only one"!

In this game you play as a shepherd dog trying to herd the sheep back into their pen in only one minute!

Credits:

Graphics : SpaceCat

Grass Background : (Ironthunder on opengameart)

Background Music (Magic_Spark on itch and Soundcloud):

Sound effects: various royalty free websites

I hope you enjoy my game!

(All the graphics except for the font and the grass were created during the jam time)
